name: Cobra 64 Pixel
description:
Cruise around the waterways to defeat three bosses in the area. Beware of various hazards along the way.

This is my LOWREZJAM 2017 hommage to Cobra Triangle for the NES.

Controls:
Keyboard
Move         W/S
Turn            A/D
Fire             Spacebar/LMB
Zoom         TAB/RMB
Exit             ESC

Gamepad

Move         Left and Right Triggers
Turn           Left Joystick
Fire             A/B/X
Zoom         Y
Exit             Back

Note that the pixels can be scaled with PgUp/PgDn, +/- or d-pad Up/Down.
